qas.question: What automotive brands exist in Portugal?
What aerospace companies exist in Portugal?
Where is Volkswagen Group's AutoEuropa assembly plant located?
What are the main centers for the Portuguese aerospace industries?

answers.text: Alverca, Covilhã, Évora, and Ponte de Sor

qas.question: Where are the main centers of the biotech and IT industries located?

answers.text: Lisbon, Porto, Braga, Coimbra and Aveiro

context: Industry is diversified, ranging from automotive (<a0_0>Volkswagen Autoeuropa and Peugeot Citroen<a0_0/>), aerospace (<a1_0>Embraer and OGMA<a1_0/>), electronics and textiles, to food, chemicals, cement and wood pulp. Volkswagen Group's AutoEuropa motor vehicle assembly plant in <a2_0>Palmela<a2_0/> is among the largest foreign direct investment projects in Portugal. Modern non-traditional technology-based industries, such as aerospace, biotechnology and information technology, have been developed in several locations across the country. <a3_0>Alverca, Covilhã, Évora, and Ponte de Sor<a3_0/> are the main centres of the Portuguese aerospace industry, which is led by Brazil-based company Embraer and the Portuguese company OGMA. Following the turn of the 21st century, many major biotechnology and information technology industries have been founded, and are concentrated in the metropolitan areas of <a4_0>Lisbon, Porto, Braga, Coimbra and Aveiro<a4_0/>.[citation needed]
